Generating a monthly income of approximately $1,000, the property is located in the district center which is considerably populated, packed with financial institutions, markets, business premises and other governmental offices. The property has the potential to be converted into a restaurant, a bank, an office or other business premise as well.

\With the gradual social and economic recovery plus the adaptation of the new normal practices in covid-19 context, tourism sites in Kampong Thom province such as Phnom Sontuk, Phum Prasat Temple, Soban Teuk resorts, etc. will be revisited by tourists which will boost the traffic as well as the economy, hence the demand for real estate asset in the area.
